org.netbeans.core/2 3.53.1

Package org.netbeans.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    WindowSystem
    Interface describing basic control over window system.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CLIOptions2
    Shows the main window, so it is fronted when second instance of NetBeans tries to start.
    CoreBridgeImpl
    Implements necessary callbacks from module system.
    ExitDialog
    Dialog which lets the user select which open files to close.
    GuiRunLevel
    GUI-oriented NetBeans startup logic.
    HtmlBrowserComponent
    Formerly HtmlBrowser.BrowserComponent.
    HtmlBrowserComponent.BrowserReplacer  
    IDESettings
    Stores and loads web browser settings.
    ModuleActions
    Holds list of all actions added by modules.
    NbErrorManager
    Wraps errormanager with logger.
    NbKeymap  
    NbKeymap.AcceleratorBindingImpl  
    NbLifecycleManager
    Default implementation of the lifecycle manager interface that knows how to save all modified DataObject's, and to exit the IDE safely.
    NbLoaderPool  
    NbStatusDisplayer
    Default status displayer implementation; GUI is in StatusLine.
    NbURLDisplayer
    Implementation of URL displayer, which shows documents in the configured web browser.
    NotifyExcPanel
    Notifies exceptions.
    ProxySettings  
    ProxySettings.NbProxyCredentialsProvider  
    ProxySettings.Reloader
    A bridge between o.n.core and core.network.
    Services Deprecated
    Obsoleted by lookup and new settings system.
    UIExceptions
    Don't use this class outside fo core, copy its impl, if you really think you need it.
